title: Escape from sanity: a study of schizophrenia
brief_description: A detailed investigation of schizophrenia, the most common form of mental illness, interviewing patients and staff of a psychiatric hospital. Considers the causes of the condition and approaches to treatment and stresses the modern approach - the confrontation situation - based on research in schizophrenics’ families.
